"warum gibt es immer noch companies, die unsere personlichen daten sammeln und verkaufen? gibt es wirklich keinen schutz f체r unsere privatsph채re? #datenschutz #privatsph채re #security"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? is there really no protection for our privacy? #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of protecting personal information regarding data privacy. it questions why companies are still able to collect and sell personal data without adequate protection for individuals' privacy. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsph채re (privacy), and #security (security) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post to ongoing conversations about data privacy and security.
